notesStmt.note: Translation of the second part of author's L'héroine mousquetaire.
Attributed to Jean de Préchac. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Includes publisher's catalog on 2 p. at end.
Reproduction of original in: University of Chicago. Library.
